original_text: Hezekiah and all the people rejoiced at what God had brought about for his people, because it was done so quickly.
korean_text: 이 일이 갑자기 되었으나 하나님께서 백성을 위하여 예비하셨으므로 히스기야가 백성과 더불어 기뻐하였더라
